birds.name: Shoebill
birds.habitat: Swamps of central tropical Africa
birds.features: Massive shoe-shaped bill, dinosaur-like posture, slow movements

birds.name: Andean Cock-of-the-Rock
birds.habitat: Cloud forests of the Andes (South America)
birds.features: Bright red-orange plumage, large half-disc crest, loud display calls

birds.name: Bearded Vulture
birds.habitat: Mountainous regions of Europe, Africa, and Asia
birds.features: Orange-stained feathers, drops bones to crack them, bearded face

birds.name: Blue-footed Booby
birds.habitat: Coastal areas of the eastern Pacific (Galápagos, Peru, Mexico)
birds.features: Bright blue feet, elaborate mating dances, dives for prey

birds.name: Club-winged Manakin
birds.habitat: Cloud forests of Ecuador and Colombia
birds.features: Makes violin-like sounds by rubbing wings together

birds.name: Frigatebird
birds.habitat: Tropical and subtropical oceans
birds.diet: Fish, squid, stolen food from other birds
birds.features: Huge red throat pouch in males, long forked tail, cannot land on water

birds.name: Great Potoo
birds.habitat: Tropical forests of Central and South America
birds.features: Camouflaged as tree bark, haunting vocalizations, nocturnal

birds.name: Greater Sage-Grouse
birds.habitat: Sagebrush plains of western North America
birds.features: Males inflate yellow air sacs and make popping sounds in displays

birds.name: Guianan Cock-of-the-Rock
birds.habitat: Rainforests of northern South America
birds.features: Bright orange plumage, half-moon crest, communal courtship displays

birds.name: Harpy Eagle
birds.habitat: Tropical rainforests of Central and South America
birds.features: Massive claws, crown-like feathers, incredibly powerful hunter

birds.name: Helmeted Hornbill
birds.habitat: Rainforests of Southeast Asia
birds.features: Solid casque used for aerial headbutting, eerie laughing call

birds.name: Hoatzin
birds.habitat: Swamps and river forests of the Amazon Basin
birds.features: Ferments food like a cow, smells bad, chicks have clawed wings

birds.name: Inca Tern
birds.habitat: Coastal cliffs of Peru and Chile
birds.features: Gray body with elegant white mustache, bright red beak and feet

birds.name: Kakapo
birds.habitat: Forests of New Zealand
birds.features: Flightless nocturnal parrot, sweet smell, booming mating calls

birds.name: King of Saxony Bird-of-Paradise
birds.habitat: Mountain forests of New Guinea
birds.features: Two extremely long head plumes used in mating displays

birds.name: Long-wattled Umbrellabird
birds.habitat: Rainforests of Colombia and Ecuador
birds.features: Large hanging throat wattle, umbrella-like crest

birds.name: Marabou Stork
birds.habitat: Savannas and wetlands of sub-Saharan Africa
birds.features: Bare head, pink throat pouch, scavenger habits, called 'undertaker bird'

birds.name: Secretary Bird
birds.habitat: Grasslands and savannas of sub-Saharan Africa
birds.features: Long legs, hunts by stomping prey, quill-like feathers on head

birds.name: Smew
birds.habitat: Northern Europe and Asia (lakes, rivers, wetlands)
birds.features: Striking black-and-white plumage, looks like a 'panda duck'

birds.name: Superb Bird-of-Paradise
birds.habitat: Rainforests of New Guinea
birds.features: Transforms into a black oval with blue highlights during courtship
